home.name: Murilo Rocha

works.title: SMV Zap
works.description: Landing page built with Next.js for a WhatsApp extension featuring a CRM and message broadcasting system. Both the extension (developed in React with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn) and the backend (built with Node.js) were projects I worked on within the same company.

works.title: Bloch Sphere
works.description: Interactive 3D Bloch Sphere built with React and React Three Fiber for a college project, running in the browser. Users can manipulate qubit state parameters and instantly visualize the corresponding quantum-state formula and its computed results.

works.title: Olhaozap.AI
works.description: Website that shortens WhatsApp links for free, built with Next.js and Next Server Actions.

works.title: Wombo Combo Rush
works.description: A fully self-made game developed for a college game jam, built with C# and the Unity engine, and playable directly in the web browser.

works.title: Wombo Combo Rush
works.description: A fully self-made game developed for a college game jam, built with C# and the Unity engine, and playable directly in the web browser.

Habilities.MainText: A strong foundation is essential for any project. I deliver beautiful and intuitive designs that align with your brand's essence. I believe usability and aesthetics go hand-in-hand to make better products.
Using the latest web dev techs, I build pixel-perfect, fast and accessible websites. I specialise in creative interactions and transitions.
This is my most preferred service as it allows the entire website creation—from concept to final site—to be seamless and ultra-fast.

home.SparkMensage: I enjoy designing meaningful experiences for brands & businesses to help them serve their target users.

about.aboutMe: I’m a Brazilian front-end developer with a passion for solving problems and building innovative digital experiences. With expertise in Node.js, Next.js.
about.history: I enjoy playing guitar, listening to music, and playing video games. I also like to run, spend time at the beach, and practice meditation to disconnect from the internet and technology, focusing on mindfulness and relaxation.
about.history2: I have a passion for learning a bit of everything, from Arduino automation and machining to studying new languages like Italian.
about.anotherInspirationsTitle: My development stack is focused on front-end technologies like React, Next.js, and other modern tools to create responsive and dynamic user experiences.
about.anotherInspirationsText: Apart from my main domain, I also like branding, icon design and minimal illustrations. I am an enthusiast of digital art, motion design & WebGL.
